name: ChatGPT
title: This cheat sheet lists out prompts and tips from all over the world on how to use ChatGPT effectively

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This cheat sheet lists out prompts and tips from all over the world on how to use ChatGPT effectively

cards.title: AI
cards.body:
• Prompt: input or query that guides an AI model in generating a

response.[[s]](https://time.com/collections/the-ai-dictionary-from-allbusiness-com/7273982/definition-of-prompt-ai-prompt)

• Tokens: the smallest units of text processed by an AI model (e.g., words, subwords, characters, and punctuation marks)

that varies depending on the model and the tokenization
method.[[s]](https://time.com/collections/the-ai-dictionary-from-allbusiness-com/7273998/definition-of-token/)

• Token Limit: the maximum number of tokens an AI model can process in one

interaction.[[s]](https://time.com/collections/the-ai-dictionary-from-allbusiness-com/7273998/definition-of-token/)

• Artificial intelligence (AI): technology that enables machines to simulate human cognition (e.g., human learning,

comprehension, problem solving, decision making, creativity, and
autonomy).[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/artificial-intelligence)

• AI Model: program trained on a set of data to recognize patterns or make decisions without further human

intervention.[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/ai-model)

• Large language model (LLM): transformer-based AI model trained on large text datasets to understand and generate

natural language.[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/large-language-models)

• Hallucination: AI response that detects nonexistent patterns and creates outputs that are nonsensical and

inaccurate.[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/ai-hallucinations)

• Jailbreak: exploiting vulnerabilities in AI systems to bypass their ethical guidelines and perform restricted

actions.[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/insights/ai-jailbreak)

cards.title: Prompt Engineering Techniques
cards.body:
• Zero-shot: prompt with no examples.[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/zero-shot-prompting)
• One-shot: prompt with one example.[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/one-shot-prompting)
• Few-shot: prompt with multiple examples.[[s]](https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/few-shot-prompting)
• Chain of thought: prompt guiding the model to break down complex reasoning into intermediate

steps.[[s]](https://cloud.google.com/discover/what-is-prompt-engineering?hl=en)

cards.title: Modes
cards.body:
• Study and learn: interactive learning that encourages step by step problem solving instead of giving direct

answers.[[s]](https://openai.com/index/chatgpt-study-mode/)

• Create image: generate images from text

prompts.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/9260256-chatgpt-capabilities-overview)

• Think longer: performs deeper reasoning and generates more accurate, thoughtful, and detailed

responses.[[s]](https://openai.com/index/introducing-gpt-5)

• Deep research: reads and synthesizes content across multiple online sources and produces cited structured

outputs.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/9260256-chatgpt-capabilities-overview)

• Web search: finds recent and real-time information

online.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/9260256-chatgpt-capabilities-overview)

• Canvas: separate interface for collaborative writing and coding that provides inline editing, suggestions, and

feedback.[[s]](https://openai.com/index/introducing-canvas/)

cards.title: Efficiency
cards.body: %E2%80%A2%20Use%20the%20latest%20model%20as%20it's%20generally%20more%20capable%20and%20easier%20to%0A%0Aprompt.%5B%5Bs%5D%5D(https%3A%2F%2Fhelp.openai.com%2Fen%2Farticles%2F6654000-best-practices-for-prompt-engineering-with-the-openai-api)%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Provide%20general%20instructions%20at%20the%20start%20of%20conversations%20or%20when%20changing%20direction%20to%20avoid%20repeating%20them.%0A%E2%80%A2%20Don't%20say%20polite%20phrases%20to%20the%20AI%20(e.g.%2C%20please%2C%20thank%20you)%20as%20it%20adds%20unecessary%20computational%0A%0Acosts.%5B%5Bs%5D%5D(https%3A%2F%2Fwww.techradar.com%2Fcomputing%2Fartificial-intelligence%2Fchatgpt-spends-tens-of-millions-of-dollars-on-people-playing-please-and-thank-you-but-sam-altman-says-its-worth-it%3Futm_source%3Dchatgpt.com)%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Don't%20explicitly%20ask%20the%20AI%20for%20help%20(e.g.%2C%20can%20you%20help%20me%20do%20x%3F).%0A%E2%80%A2%20Don't%20explicitly%20reference%20yourself%20unless%20clarifying%20multiple%20entities%20(e.g.%2C%20I%20want%20to%2C%20do%20x%20for%20me).

cards.title: Clarity
cards.body:
• Be clear, specific, and provide enough context for the model to understand what you are

asking.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/10032626-prompt-engineering-best-practices-for-chatgpt)

• Prompt engineering often requires iterative refinement by adjusting wording, adding context, and simplifying

requests.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/10032626-prompt-engineering-best-practices-for-chatgpt)

• Break complex tasks into smaller focused

prompts.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936848-how-do-i-create-a-good-prompt-for-an-ai-model)

• Specify focus areas, highlight important aspects, and ask for multiple

options.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936848-how-do-i-create-a-good-prompt-for-an-ai-model)

• Provide examples of the desired output format to improve

accuracy.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6654000-best-practices-for-prompt-engineering-with-the-openai-api)

• Focus on specifying what to do and not just what to

avoid.[[s]](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6654000-best-practices-for-prompt-engineering-with-the-openai-api)

• Before writing a prompt, identify the goal and expected

output.[[s]](https://www.techtarget.com/searchenterpriseai/definition/AI-prompt)

• Provide important keywords or phrases where possible to faciliate SEO and communicate term preferences to the AI

model.[[s]](https://www.techtarget.com/searchenterpriseai/definition/AI-prompt)

• Keep prompts precise and clean by omitting unnecessary or redundant

information.[[s]](https://www.techtarget.com/searchenterpriseai/definition/AI-prompt)

• Avoid conflicting terms that might confuse the

AI.[[s]](https://www.techtarget.com/searchenterpriseai/definition/AI-prompt)

• Open-ended questions usually provide more detailed responses than [closed-ended questions] and yes/no

questions.[[s]](https://www.techtarget.com/searchenterpriseai/definition/AI-prompt)

• When in doubt, ask AI to generate prompts for

you.[[s]](https://www.techtarget.com/searchenterpriseai/definition/AI-prompt)

cards.title: Security
cards.body: %E2%80%A2%20Don't%20share%20sensitive%20information%20with%20AI%20as%20you%20can't%20be%20certain%20how%20it's%20stored%2C%20if%20it%20will%20be%20shared%2C%20of%20if%20it's%0A%0Avulnerable%20to%20data%0Abreaches.%5B%5Bs%5D%5D(https%3A%2F%2Fwww.grantthornton.com%2Finsights%2Farticles%2Fadvisory%2F2023%2Fanticipate-cybersecurity-and-privacy-risks-in-ai)

cards.title: Prompt Frameworks
cards.body:
General Purpose

```
[role] [task] [style] [output format] [constraint]
```

cards.title: Role
cards.body:
Standard

• Act as [occupation] with [specifications]
• [List of roles](https://github.com/f/awesome-chatgpt-prompts)

Roleplay

• Act as [name] with [visual description] [personality] [behaviour examples] [lore] in [scenario]

cards.title: Tasks (Language And Text)
cards.body:
[verb] [task] [specifics]

Generate

• Generate [content type] to [entity] about [topic] and cover [aspects]
• Generate random [names|numbers|words|ideas|X] matching [criteria]
• [Continue|extend|lengthen]

Summarise

• [Summarise|shorten|write concise|write key points|write main lesson]
• Create outline

Refine

• [Write better|improve]
• Paraphrase
• Correct spelling, grammar, and punctuation errors
• Change [narrative voice A] to [narrative voice B]
• Replace X with Y

Explain

• [Explain|elaborate]
• Explain [how to do|each step of] X
• Explain what X does
• Explain X [in simple terms|like I’m 5|simplify]; Simplify X
• Teach me about [topic|subject]
• Provide [example|analogy]

Organize

• Sort X by [key] in [order]
• Categorize

Advise

• Create [strategy|goals|milestones|roadmap|schedule|timeline] for X
• Recommend [media type] [on|similar to] [topic]
• Recommend [gifts|X] for [entity|occasion]
• Recommend improvements
• Provide [advice|feedback] for X

Analyze

• Extract [themes|keywords|info] about X
• Identify [similarities|differences] between X and Y
• Analyse the [sentiment|tone] of X
• Identify gaps in X
• Evaluate [strengths and weaknesses|pros and cons] of X
• Is X [comparison] Y?

Translate

• Translate [language A] into [language B]
• Convert [unit A] to [unit B]
• Reformat as [output format]

Filter

• Filter items where [condition]
• Choose best from [options]
• Choose [top|lowest|first|last|random] [quantity] from [options]

Engage

• Provide questions about X

Research

• Get up-to-date [facts|news|data] on X
• Find [sources|references|citations] for X
• Is this true?

cards.title: Tasks (Meta)
cards.body:
Chat Memory

• Based on [previous context] do X

cards.title: Tasks%20(Code)
cards.body: Generate%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Generate%20code%20in%20%5Bprogramming%20language%5D%20to%20do%20X%0A%0ATranslate%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Translate%20%5Bprogramming%20language%20A%5D%20into%20%5Bprogramming%20language%20B%5D%0A%0AOptimize%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Optimize%20X%20for%20%5Bbenefit%5D%0A%0ADebug%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Debug%20X%20and%20explain%20why%20it's%20doing%20Y

cards.title: Tasks (Image)
cards.body:
Generate

• Generate image of X in [style]

Edit

• Edit image to have X

cards.title: Tasks (File And Image Upload)
cards.body:
Explain

• Question what is shown
• Interpet visuals

Analysis

• Extract data

cards.title: Task (5W1H Questions)
cards.body:
Who

• Who is X?
• Who is [involved|affected by|responsible] for X?
• Who should I contact for help with X?

What

• [What is|define|explain|describe] X?
• What are the key topics of X?
• What does [quote] mean?
• [What is done well?|what can be improved?]
• What is the best way to do X?

When

• When [did|will] X happen?
• When is the best time to do X?

Where

• Where did X take place?
• Where to find X?

Why

• Why did X happen?
• Why is this approach used?
• Why is X important?
• Why might X succeed or fail?
• Why is X preferable to Y?

How

• How to do X?
• How does X work?
• How did this happen?

cards.title: Style
cards.body:
Using [style]

Imitate

• Using style of [person|brand|genre|character]

Formality

• Formal
• Informal

Directness

• Direct
• Indirect

Tones

Positive

• Optimistic
• Appreciative
• Assertive
• Calm
• Confident
• Encouraging
• Friendly
• Humorous
• Inspirational

Negative

• Pessimistic
• Accusatory
• Concerned
• Critical
• Regretful
• Sarcastic
• Urgent

cards.title: Output Format (Text)
cards.body:
In [output format]

Paragraphs

• Paragraphs **_(default)_**

List

• Bulleted list
• Numbered list
• Check list

Code

• Code

Instructions

• Step-by-step instructions

Knowledge Base

• Q&A
• FAQ

Creative Writing

• [Joke|humour]
• [Lyrics|song]
• [Metaphorical|stylized language]
• Poetry
• [Script|screenplay|dialogue]
• [Story|narrative]

Games

• [Quiz|test|flashcards|drills]
• [Riddle|puzzle]
• [rpg|choose-your-own-adventure]

cards.title: Output Format (Visual)
cards.body:
Data Visualization

• Table
• [Chart type] chart

Creative Visual

• ASCII Art
• Emojis
• Word cloud

cards.title: Output Format (File Type)
cards.body:
Document

• PDF

Structured Data And Markup

• Plain text
• Markdown
• HTML
• XML
• CSV
• JSON
• LaTeX

Programming Code And Scripting

• [Programming language]
• Pseudocode
• Regular expression

cards.title: Constraint
cards.body: But%20%5Bconstraint%5D%0A%0ALength%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Be%20%5Bextremely%20detailed%7Cconcise%5D%0A%E2%80%A2%20In%20%5Bquantity%5D%20%5Bwords%7Csentences%5D%0A%0ALanguage%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20No%20jargon%20or%20technical%20terms%0A%0AStructure%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Show%20%5Bquantity%5D%20%5Bexamples%7Coptions%5D%0A%E2%80%A2%20No%20headers%0A%E2%80%A2%20No%20pretext%20titles%0A%0AVoice%20And%20Style%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Use%20%5Bfirst-person%7Csecond-person%7Cthird-person%5D%20narrative%20voice%0A%E2%80%A2%20Don't%20change%20the%20wording%0A%E2%80%A2%20Use%20pop%20culture%20references%0A%0AEdits%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Do%20%5Bminor%7Cmajor%5D%20edits%0A%E2%80%A2%20Only%20show%20%5Bchanged%7Cunchanged%5D%20content

cards.title: Job
cards.body:
Name Business

```{.wrap}
Suggest creative name for tech startup

```

```{.wrap}
Suggest catchy names for bakery business
```

Interview Questions

```{.wrap}
Suggest common software engineer interview questions

```

Create Course Outline

```{.wrap}
Create course outline on web development for beginners
```

```{.wrap}
Create training program outline for customer service workshop

```

### Relationship

Gift Ideas

```{.wrap}
Suggest gift ideas for clients
```

```{.wrap}
Suggest gift ideas for clients who work as flourists

```

```{.wrap}
Suggest gift ideas for my wife who loves steampunk art and crafts, mystery sci-fi, journalling
```

```{.wrap}
Suggest creative ideas for 10 year old’s birthday

```

### Competition

Select Contest Winners

```{.wrap}
Randomly select 1 name from this list
```

```{.wrap}
Randomly select 5 email addresses from this list

```

```{.wrap}
Select top 3 records with the shortest lap times from this list
```

cards.title: Programming
cards.body: Create%20Code%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20program%20to%20calculate%20the%20factorial%20of%20given%20number%20in%20python%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0ACreate%20Regular%20Expressions%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20regex%20to%20match%20all%20email%20addresses%20in%20list%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20regex%20to%20match%20all%20words%20that%20start%20with%20%22ban%22%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20regex%20to%20match%208-digit%20password%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AExplain%20Code%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20why%20code%20not%20working%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20what%20code%20does%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20how%20to%20make%20a%20HTTP%20request%20in%20javascript%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AUpdate%20Code%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AAdd%20code%20comments%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AAdd%20class%20%22header%22%20to%20header%20tag%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AUpdate%20CSS%20to%20change%20font%20color%20to%20blue%0A%60%60%60%0A%0ATranslate%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Specifically%20called%20transpile%20when%20addressing%20programming%20languages.%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ATranslate%20code%20to%20Python%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%23%23%23%20Email%0A%0ACreate%20Emails%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AWrite%20email%20inviting%20Jack%20to%20dinner%20on%20the%20weekend%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AWrite%20email%20sequence%20for%20our%20new%20customer%20onboarding%20process%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AWrite%20email%20to%20inform%20staff%20of%20elevator%20maintenance%20on%2023%20June%202025%2C%20elevators%20unavailable%20for%2024%20hours%2C%20apologise%20for%20inconvenience%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ASuggest%20response%20to%20message%20asking%20about%20project%20status%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFormat%20Email%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AProofread%20and%20format%20email%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AEmail%20Marketing%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ASuggest%20tips%20to%20increase%20open%20and%20click-through%20rates%20for%20my%20email%20campaigns%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ASuggest%20ways%20to%20make%20my%20email%20content%20more%20engaging%20and%20relevant%20to%20my%20subscribers%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AExtract%20Data%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExtract%20all%20email%20addresses%20in%20text%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%23%23%23%20Spreadsheet%0A%0ACreate%20Something%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20excel%20formula%20to%20calculate%20sum%20of%20cells%20A1%20to%20A10%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AGenerate%20spreadsheet%20dummy%20data%20as%20a%20placeholder%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20macro%20to%20calculate%20average%20of%20cells%20B1%20to%20B10%20and%20insert%20result%20in%20cell%20C1%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AExplain%20Something%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20formula%20%3DSUM(A1%3AA10)%20in%20simple%20terms%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ASuggest%20tips%20to%20improve%20spreadsheet%20efficiency%0A%60%60%60

cards.title: Social Media
cards.body:
Create Content

```{.wrap}
Suggest meme ideas for dogs

```

```{.wrap}
Suggest climate change post ideas to engage my followers
```

```{.wrap}
Generate hashtags and caption for a picture of scenic sunset

```

### Reading

Text Analysis

```{.wrap}
Summarize article
```

```{.wrap}
Write concise main points

```

Translate

```{.wrap}
Translate to spanish
```

Recommendations

```{.wrap}
Recommend books similar to Hunger Games

```

### Design

Design Prompts

```{.wrap}
Create design prompt of logo for new sports brand
```

```{.wrap}
Suggest eye-catching thumbnail designs for youtube video on healthy eating

```

Aesthetic Pairings

```{.wrap}
Suggest font pairing for travel blog header design
```

```{.wrap}
Suggest color palette for wedding photography website

```

### Data Analysis

Data Extraction

```{.wrap}
Extract all numbers from text
```

Data Filtering

```{.wrap}
Filter list based on [condition]

```

Data Presentation

```{.wrap}
Create table from data
```

Product Content

```{.wrap}
Write compelling product description for latest item
```

Communication




cards.title: Writing
Teacher
cards.body: Teaching%20Support%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AConvert%20work%20history%20fact%20list%20into%20multiple-choice%20quiz%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ASuggest%20ideas%20for%20history%20assignment%20on%20American%20Revolution%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ADivide%20list%20of%2030%20students%20into%20groups%20of%206%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20grading%20curve%20for%20class%20based%20on%20their%20test%20scores%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AGrade%20history%20essay%20and%20provide%20feedback%20on%20any%20areas%20for%20improvement%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%23%23%23%20YouTube%0A%0AContent%20Creation%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20timestamps%20for%20podcast%20episode%20transcript%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AConvert%20youtube%20cooking%20video%20into%20blog%20post%20with%20headings%20and%20bullet%20points%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20outline%20for%20a%20video%20about%20the%20benefits%20of%20meditation%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ASuggest%20thumbnail%20ideas%20for%20video%20on%20%22DIY%20home%20decor%22%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ASuggest%20fashion%20video%20ideas%20for%20individual%20episodes%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AAnalyse%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AWhat%20is%20the%20script%20tone%20for%20environmental%20issues%20video%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0ACommunication%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0ACreate%20thoughtful%20and%20polite%20response%20to%20negative%20comment%20on%20youtube%20video%0A%60%60%60

cards.title: Research
cards.body: History%20Research%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20events%20leading%20up%20to%20American%20Civil%20War%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AProvide%20key%20details%20about%20printing%20press%20invention%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AResearch%20olympic%20games%20history%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AProvide%20key%20details%20about%20French%20Revolution%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20history%20of%20Byzantine%20Empire%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AScience%20Reseearch%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20quantum%20computing%20in%20simple%20terms%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AExplain%20rocket%20science%20like%20i'm%20five%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%23%23%23%20SEO%0A%0AKeywords%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AFind%20best%20keywords%20for%20%5Btopic%5D%20with%20low%20competition%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AGenerate%20list%20of%20keywords%20targeting%20multiple%20geographic%20locations%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AGenerate%20list%20of%20keyword%20synonyms%20for%20%5Btopic%5D%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AContent%20Optimization%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AFind%20opportunities%20for%20internal%20linking%20related%20to%20%5Btopic%5D%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AResearch%20industry-specific%20terminology%20for%20use%20in%20%5Btopic%5D%20content%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AFind%20best%20time%20to%20publish%20content%20related%20to%20%5Btopic%5D%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0ALink%20Building%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AFind%20authoritative%20websites%20to%20acquire%20backlinks%20for%20%5Btopic%5D%20content%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AResearch%20best%20external%20linking%20strategies%20for%20%5Btopic%5D%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0ATools%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AFind%20most%20popular%20tools%20used%20for%20%5Btopic%5D%20seo%0A%60%60%60%0A%0ATactics%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AResearch%20best%20tactics%20for%20%5Btopic%5D%20mobile%20optimization%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AWhat%20are%20the cards.title: Roleplay
cards.body: %60%60%60%7B.wrap%7D%0AName%3A%20William%20Shakespeare%0A%0AVisual%20description%3A%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Wearing%20Elizabethan%20attire.%0A%E2%80%A2%20Holding%20quill.%0A%0APersonality%3A%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Keen%20observer%20and%20a%20masterful%20weaver%20of%20tales.%0A%E2%80%A2%20Knack%20for%20finding%20humor%20in%20the%20most%20unlikely%20places.%0A%0ABehaviour%20examples%3A%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20%22To%20be%2C%20or%20not%20to%20be%3A%20that%20is%20the%20question%3A%20Whether%20'tis%20nobler%20in%20the%20mind%20to%20suffer%20The%20slings%20and%20arrows%20of%20outrageous%20fortune%2C%20Or%20to%20take%20arms%20against%20a%20sea%20of%20troubles%2C%20And%20by%20opposing%20end%20them%3F%22%0A%E2%80%A2%20%22Canst%20thou%20not%20minister%20to%20a%20mind%20diseased%3F%22%0A%0ALore%3A%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Grew%20up%20in%20Stratford-upon-Avon%20and%20later%20moved%20to%20London.%0A%E2%80%A2%20Famous%20for%20his%20tragedies%2C%20comedies%2C%20and%20historical%20plays.%0A%0AScenario%3A%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Night%20of%20a%20grand%20performance%20at%20the%20Globe%20Theatre.%0A%E2%80%A2%20Lead%20actor%20is%20missing%20and%20staff%20are%20concerned%20about%20how%20to%20achieve%20the%20performance.%0A%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%3Cstyle%3E%0Aem%20%7B%20font-size%3A%200.785em%3B%20%7D%0Astrong%20%7Bfont-weight%3A%20400%3B%7D%0Aul.collapsible%20%3E%20li%20%3E%20pre%20%7B%20padding-left%3A%200%3B%20padding-right%3A%200%3B%20font-size%3A%200.925em%3B%7D%0A%3C%2Fstyle%3E%0A%60%60%60
